item.description:
Come join us for some fun canoeing or kayaking on the Charles River in Newton. We will rent boats from Charles River Canoe and Kayak. We usually have 3 to 4 in a canoe. The Kayaks fit one or two individuals. All levels are welcome. And it is your choice to canoe or to kayak. We will try and get a group discount.

Cost: Approximately $12/person.

Here are directions to their Newton location:[url=http://www.paddleboston.com/newton/directions.php]

http://www.paddleboston.com/newton/directions.php[/url]

We will go for dinner nearby after, at Ponzu on 286 Moody Street, Waltham MA. Here's their website http://www.theponzu.com/.

We hope you can make it! The weather looks good for Saturday.

PS - Transportation is your own responsibility. However, if you need a ride, please note where you are located (town) and/or which T stop you can meet at. Our members are very good about offering rides if they can.

We can also arrange to pick people up at the Woodland - Newton T stop (D train, Green Line).

Parking - there is free parking. The parking lot is beyond the boathouse and bear right.
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet outside the entrance

group.name: The Greater Boston Asian Professionals Meetup Group

item.name: Canoeing/Kayaking on the Charles
